amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt all rules that OMB determines would result in net job creation from the provisions of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 112-296 to exempt from the bill all rules that OMB determines would result in net job creation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 243 (Roll no. 876).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 243 (Roll no. 876).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Peters.
